---
title: "Task 8: Forecasting cases and deaths"
---

## Overview

This task covers forecasting cases and deaths. You will learn how to build forecasting models and generate predictions of future disease incidence.

## Learning Objectives

- Build forecasting models for epidemiological data
- Generate short-term and long-term forecasts
- Quantify forecast uncertainty
- Evaluate forecast performance
